about_the_game:
en

Explore steamy romances, forge intense connections, and navigate the seductive allure of lustful encounters in this provocative visual novel.
"COLLEGE SEX FEST 2024" plunges you into the intoxicating world of college, where every decision propels you further into a web of desire and temptation.

As you venture forth, you'll encounter a diverse array of characters, including sultry vixens, mischievous co-eds, and insatiable temptresses. Delve into the depths of passion and lust as you navigate sizzling romances and pulse-pounding encounters amidst the chaotic backdrop of campus life.

Your choices will not only dictate the course of your relationships but also shape the climactic finale of the ultimate party extravaganza.

Key Features:


  • Sensual Encounters: Indulge in steamy rendezvous and lascivious liaisons with a variety of alluring characters, each with their own insatiable appetites and seductive charms.
  • Interactive Storytelling: Influence the narrative through provocative choices that ignite fiery passions and unlock new levels of intimacy with your sultry companions.

  • Provocative Visuals: Immerse yourself in a world of seduction and desire with captivating animations and tantalizing scenes that leave little to the imagination.
  • Party Planning: Engage in the electrifying process of organizing the most debaucherous party of the year, from selecting themes to managing guest lists and navigating the intricate dynamics of desire.

  • Tempting Situations: Navigate a series of tantalizing scenarios and provocative encounters inspired by the tantalizing allure of college life's most libidinous desires.

  • Multiple Endings: Explore a myriad of climactic conclusions based on your amorous escapades, ensuring each playthrough offers a tantalizingly different journey through the realms of lust, passion, and hedonistic revelry.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains the following sexual content: sexual acts, sexual violence, extreme violence(torture), group sex, sexual assault/non-consensual sex, drug/alcohol abuse.
The app involves topics that customers may have a sensitivity to, and would like to be aware of, such as Bondage, BDSM elemens.
This game doesn't contains the following content: self-harm, suicide.
This game is for ADULTS only and it includes explicit, sexual content that some viewers may find offensive. The characters shown in the game are all over 20 years old.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Steam OS or Ubuntu 16.04
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Version 10.11+
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E4700
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: COLLEGE SEX FEST 2024

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 6500
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 6500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750

short_description: Dive into a whirlwind adventure as a freshman college student navigating the thrilling highs and tantalizing lows of campus life, all while gearing up for the legendary "SEX FEST."
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Portuguese - Brazil, Indonesian, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Turkish, Ukrainian, Japanese
